footer.subtitle: and agree to
footer.title: I confirm that I have read, understood

header.subtitle: In order to access your account, you need to complete the Identity verification process.
header.title: Confirm your identity

confirmation.0: We encrypt your data and send them for verification.
confirmation.1: Your data will only be used to verify your identity.
confirmation.2: We check that your document is clearly legible.
confirmation.3: We check that your document is free from external damage and that all the required markings are visible.
confirmation.4: We check that the data in your document is not obscured by shadows or light rays.
confirmation.5: We check that the image of face is clearly visible in your document.
confirmation.6: We scan text and special marks on the document.
confirmation.7: We verify the authenticity and validity of the data.
confirmation.8: We check your document status and data in the registers.
confirmation.9: We encrypt data and transmit it for final approval.
confirmation.10: Verification is taking longer than expected. Please wait, there are only a few moments left.
confirmation.subtitle: We are currently processing your KYC application and will notify you as soon as we receive the results. We appreciate your patience and understanding during this process.
confirmation.title: Facial analysis in progress
